definition: of or relating to the ancient Latins or the Latin language, the Latin language
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the ancient Latins or the Latin language
= example: of or relating to the ancient Latins or the Latin language
- of or relating to the ancient region of Latium
= example: of or relating to the ancient region of Latium
- relating to languages derived from Latin
= synonyms: Romance
- relating to people or countries speaking Romance languages
= example: relating to people or countries speaking Romance languages
noun
- the Latin language
= example: the Latin language
